description: Time shifts data by X for a field Y

script.source: if (ctx[params.field] != null) { def formatter = DateTimeFormatter.ofPattern(params.date_format); def current_time = ZonedDateTime.parse(ctx[params.field]); current_time = current_time.plusSeconds(params.time_shift_seconds);  ctx[params.field] = current_time.format(formatter);  }
